p: Antennae: AIIIO–antennal III organ; Ant.–antennal segment; ms–dorsolateral S-microchaeta; Sgd–dorsal guard S-chaeta of antennal III organ; Sgv–ventral guard S-chaeta of antennal III organ. Head: PAO–post-antennal organ. Thorax and abdomen: Abd.–abdominal segment; Di–dorsal internal group of chaetae; De–dorsal external group of chaetae; DL–dorsolateral group of chaetae; Th.–thoracic segment; tita–tibiotarsus; VT–ventral tube.
